text: Ezra Dale Polley (born August 9, 1965) is a former Major League Baseball pitcher for the New York Yankees. He bats right-handed and throws left-handed. He was signed by the Atlanta Braves as an amateur free agent in 1987. He played only in with the Yankees. Polley had a 1-3 record in 32 games, with a 7.89 ERA. title: Dale Polley
